actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to provide for the temporary suspension of duty on certain chemicals, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1995, the duty on: (1) 6-amino-1-naphthol-3-sulfonic acid; (2) diphenyl guanidine/di-o- tolylguanidine; (3) dichlorohexylben-zothiazylsulfenamide; and (4) 1,5-naphthalene diisocyanate.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the temporary suspension of duty on certain chemicals, and for other purposes.
